moves.1. d4: First amazing move: d4 instead of usual e4!!
moves.1... d5 2. Nf3 e6 3. c4 Bb4+ 4. Nc3 dxc4: From Black 7th move, I thought that he mustn't defense this Pawn!
moves.12. bxc4 bxc4 13. Bxc4 Bxg2: I think my attack will be strong enough!
moves.14. Rg1 Be4 15. Rxg7 Bg6: Black try to trap my Rook!
moves.16. Bb4: An important move: Black King cant scape to King side!
moves.16... Qc8 17. Bb5+ Nfd7 18. Nxf7 Bxf7 19: I never think of taking the Black Rook on a8!!
